text: Christopher Ranville Cramer (3 January 1948 â€“ 16 January 2021) was a British news journalist and executive. During his career, he was worked for the BBC and was an executive at CNN International. He worked as a consultant for The Wall Street Journal. He was born in Portsmouth, England. Cramer died of cancer on 16 January 2021 at age 73. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:BBC people Category:CNN people Category:English journalists Category:Writers from Portsmouth
title: Chris Cramer
